draw_pile.title: Academic Conference
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling the Academy draws 2 extra cards and may look at any player's hand.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must discard 1 card

draw_pile.title: Shadow Deal
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling a Criminal courtier may steal 1 gold from any opponent.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat loses 1 gold to the bank

draw_pile.title: Military Drill
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling Commander's Tower (BAR_01) may place 1 free influence in any Barracks square.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must remove 1 influence from Barracks if present

draw_pile.title: Garden Party
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling the Gardens gains 2 VP and reduces exposure by 1.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat's exposure increases by 1

draw_pile.title: Market Boom
draw_pile.effect: All players gain gold equal to the number of Market squares they control.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat pays 3 gold to the bank

draw_pile.title: Political Realignment
draw_pile.effect: Each player may move up to 2 of their influence markers between courtiers in the same coterie.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must move 1 influence to an opponent's courtier

draw_pile.title: Trade Winds
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling the Docks gains 4 gold and may move 2 influence between adjacent districts.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat loses 2 gold

draw_pile.title: Whispers in the Court
draw_pile.effect: All players with 5+ exposure gain 1 additional exposure.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat gains 2 additional exposure instead of 1

draw_pile.title: Street Festival
draw_pile.effect: All players gain 1 gold.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat gains no gold from this event

draw_pile.title: Tax Collector
draw_pile.effect: Each player gains 1 gold per district they control.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat pays 1 gold per district they control instead

draw_pile.title: Coronation Anniversary
draw_pile.effect: The player with the most Noble courtiers controlled gains 3 VP.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat loses 1 VP

draw_pile.title: Military Parade
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling the Barracks may remove 2 influence from any one district.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat's exposure increases by 2

draw_pile.title: Double Draw
draw_pile.effect: Draw another event card immediately.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat suffers scapegoat effect of next card too

draw_pile.title: Rising Tensions
draw_pile.effect: The two players with the most contested districts gain 1 exposure each.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat gains 2 exposure instead of 1

draw_pile.title: Scholarly Debate
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling an Academic courtier draws 1 extra card.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must discard 1 card

draw_pile.title: Dockside Rumors
draw_pile.effect: All players may look at the top card of the petition deck.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat's exposure is revealed to all players

draw_pile.title: Religious Festival
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling the Temple may place 2 influence on any Religious courtier.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must remove 1 influence from a Religious courtier they control

draw_pile.title: Rival Factions
draw_pile.effect: Any courtier with influence from 2+ players has all influence removed.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat loses all influence on contested courtiers first

draw_pile.title: Plague Outbreak
draw_pile.effect: Each player removes 1 influence from each district where they have the most influence.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat removes an additional 2 influence from any districts

draw_pile.title: Favorable Winds
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling a Maritime courtier may move 1 influence to any adjacent district.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must discard 1 gold or gain 1 exposure

draw_pile.title: Power Vacuum
draw_pile.effect: Any uncontrolled 4 VP district square becomes worth 5 VP until controlled.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat cannot claim Power Vacuum squares this turn

draw_pile.title: Foreign Delegation
draw_pile.effect: Each player may pay 3 gold to place 2 influence on any courtier.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must pay 2 gold or lose 1 VP

draw_pile.title: Noble Favor
draw_pile.effect: The player with lowest exposure gains 1 VP.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat loses 1 VP

draw_pile.title: Petition Frenzy
draw_pile.effect: If any player completes a petition this turn, they gain 1 bonus VP.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat cannot complete petitions this turn

draw_pile.title: Courtier Intrigue
draw_pile.effect: Each player may move 1 influence from one courtier to another courtier in the same coterie.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must move 1 influence to an opponent's courtier if able

draw_pile.title: Royal Decree
draw_pile.effect: The player controlling the Palace gains 3 VP. All other players gain 1 VP.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat loses 2 VP

draw_pile.title: Temple Offering
draw_pile.effect: Each player may pay 1 gold to reduce exposure by 1.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must pay 2 gold to reduce exposure by 1

draw_pile.title: Scandal at Court
draw_pile.effect: The player with highest exposure loses 2 VP. All other players may reduce exposure by 1.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat's exposure increases by 3

draw_pile.title: Assassination Attempt
draw_pile.effect: The player with highest exposure must remove 1 influence from any courtier they control.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat must remove 2 influence total from courtiers they control

draw_pile.title: Generous Patron
draw_pile.effect: The player with most gold must give 2 gold to the player with least gold.
draw_pile.scapegoat_effect: Scapegoat gives 1 additional gold if they have the most
